title: PHP: The Language That Powers the Web
content: PHP, or Personal Home Page Tools, was created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1994 as a set of tools for building dynamic websites. Over time, it evolved into a full-fledged programming language that now powers more than 77% of the web, including platforms like WordPress and Facebook. Despite facing criticism for its quirks, PHP’s simplicity and widespread adoption make it a cornerstone of web development.
